channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenVPN Technologies, Inc -- openvpn
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenVPN Technologies, Inc -- openvpn

item.title: CVE-2017-7520|2024-08-05T16:04:11.764Z -- openvpn%20technologies%2C%20inc -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN versions before 2.4.3 and before 2.3.17 are vulnerable to denial-of-service and/or possibly sensitive memory leak triggered by man-in-the-middle attacker.

item.title: CVE-2017-7508|2024-08-05T16:04:11.917Z -- openvpn%20technologies%2C%20inc -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN versions before 2.4.3 and before 2.3.17 are vulnerable to remote denial-of-service when receiving malformed IPv6 packet.

item.title: CVE-2017-7522|2024-08-05T16:04:11.857Z -- openvpn%20technologies%2C%20inc -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN versions before 2.4.3 and before 2.3.17 are vulnerable to denial-of-service by authenticated remote attacker via sending a certificate with an embedded NULL character.

item.title: CVE-2017-7521|2024-08-05T16:04:11.856Z -- openvpn%20technologies%2C%20inc -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN versions before 2.4.3 and before 2.3.17 are vulnerable to remote denial-of-service due to memory exhaustion caused by memory leaks and double-free issue in extract_x509_extension().

item.title: CVE-2017-7478|2024-08-05T16:04:11.580Z -- openvpn%20technologies%2C%20inc -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN version 2.3.12 and newer is vulnerable to unauthenticated Denial of Service of server via received large control packet. Note that this issue is fixed in 2.3.15 and 2.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2017-7479|2024-08-05T16:04:11.543Z -- openvpn%20technologies%2C%20inc -- openvpn
item.description: OpenVPN versions before 2.3.15 and before 2.4.2 are vulnerable to reachable assertion when packet-ID counter rolls over resulting into Denial of Service of server by authenticated attacker.
